00032 CalvinException::CalvinException()
00033 {
00034         errorCode = 0;
00035         lineNumber = 0;
00036         fileName = "";
00037         timeStamp = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString();
00038         errorDescription = L"";
00039         sourceName = L"";                       
00040 }

00070 CalvinException::CalvinException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, u_int64_t _ErrorCode)
00071 {
00072         Source(_Source);
00073         Description(_Description);
00074         LineNumber(0);
00075         SourceFile("");
00076         TimeStamp(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00077         ErrorCode(_ErrorCode);
